testcase.brief: Add/Delete policy while traffic is on-going(to-access permit, two Laptops)
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: -Laptops has been associated with AP1 and assigned an ip address
Test Procedure: 1) Laptop2 and Laptop1 ping each other continuance 2) Configure a ip-policy and bind it to FW: "ip-policy FW" "ip-policy FW to <Laptop1 ip addr> action permit" "user-profile FW security ip-policy to-access FW" "ssid <ssid_name> default-user-profile-attr [num]" 3) Check the ping pkt 4) Delete the policy config "no user-profile FW security ip-policy to-access" "no ip-policy FW id [num]" 5) Check the ping pkt

step.console: -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "user-profile ${user_id} qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan1} attribute 1"

step.telnet: -v "_ff id 1 dst-ip ${sta1.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "clear log buffered"

step.desc: - Configure a ip-policy and bind it to FW: "ip-policy FW" "ip-policy FW to <Laptop ip addr> action permit" "user-profile FW security ip-policy ip-access FW"
step.telnet: -v "ip-policy ${user_id}" -v "ip-policy ${user_id} id 1 to ${sta1.tif.ip} action permit" -v "user-profile ${user_id} security ip-policy to-access ${user_id}"

step.desc: clear forwarding-engine ip-sessions clear log all
step.telnet: -v "clear log all" -v "clear forwarding-engine ip-sessions" -v "clear arp-cache" -v "no forwarding-engine proxy-arp enable"

step.log-match: -b "\(\!\) wifi0.1 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${sta2.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -ps p "ACL: matched upid \[\d+\] dir \[ingress \(from-air\)\] upid default action \[deny\]" -e "\(i\) wifi0.1 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${sta2.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

-b "\(\!\) wifi0.1 ${sta2.tif.ip}->${sta1.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -ps p "ACL: matched upid \[\d+\] dir \[ingress \(from-air\)\] upid default action \[deny\]" -e "\(i\) wifi0.1 ${sta2.tif.ip}->${sta1.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: - Delete the policy config "no ip-policy FW id [num]"
step.telnet: -v "clear log all" -v "no ip-policy ${user_id} id 1" -v "clear forwarding-engine ip-sessions"

step.log-match: -b "\(\!\) wifi0.1 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${sta2.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -ps p "ACL: matched upid \[\d+\] dir \[ingress \(from-air\)\] upid default action \[deny\]" -e "\(i\) wifi0.1 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${sta2.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

-b "\(\!\) wifi0.1 ${sta2.tif.ip}->${sta1.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -ps p "ACL: matched upid \[\d+\] dir \[ingress \(from-air\)\] upid default action \[deny\]" -e "\(i\) wifi0.1 ${sta2.tif.ip}->${sta1.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
